page.title: 02Employment in Heolgerrig
page.content: We carried out a survey in school of where the pupils parents worked.17 parents were employed by the Local Education Authority.7 fathers work at the Police Station.9 mothers work in superstores and 10 in shops.Only 1 mother is a cleaner.6 parents work in Public houses or nightclubs.8 dads are engineers and just 2 are doctors.2 men are firemen,3 are miners.1 father is a baker.3 parents work at the Town Hall.2 fathers are salesmen and 5 are builders.Just 3 parents work in a bank and only 1 is a Vicar.2 mums work at Rhydycar Leisure Centre and 11 work at the hospital.1 father is an accountant.Hoovers and Thorns are the biggest employers in Merthyr but when we carried out our survey only 10 parents worked in Hoovers and 7 in Thorns.23 parents are unemployed.
